\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\Ty.\Delta\Tm} && \Tm \\
	\\
	{\Ty.\Delta\Ty} && \Ty \\
	\\
	\Ty & \Tm & \iC
	\arrow["\Delta"', from=5-1, to=5-2]
	\arrow["\util"', from=5-2, to=5-3]
	\arrow["u", from=3-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["\Sigma", from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{u.\util\Delta}"', from=3-1, to=5-1]
	\arrow["{\util\Delta.u}"{description}, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\Sigma.(\util\Delta.u)}"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{(\util\Delta.u).\Sigma}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\lrcorner"{anchor=center, pos=0.125}, draw=none, from=3-1, to=5-3]
	\arrow["\lrcorner"{anchor=center, pos=0.125}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
